title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2H.106 - Hudson River Estuary Signs (NYM19-1, NYM19-2)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2H.106 - Hudson River Estuary Signs (NYM19-1, NYM19-2)

State Regulations

Option: 01 Hudson River Estuary (NYM19-1, NYM19-2) signs (see Sign

Drawing SD-G24) signs may be used to inform motorists when the Hudson River

Estuary, or one of its tributaries, is being crossed. Standard: 02 The placement of all Hudson River Estuary signs shall be
subject to the review and approval of the New York State Department of

Environmental Conservation. 03 The NYM19-1 sign shall be used when the water body being
crossed is the Hudson River Estuary. The NYM19-2 sign shall be used when the
water body being crossed is a tributary of the Hudson River

Estuary. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2H.106

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
